originalText.text: Dr. Joey Fernandez is excellent! He is professional, knowledgeable, thorough, attentive, and caring. He responds to questions, concerns, and messages quickly and thoughtfully. The entire staff at The Samuel Friedman Health Center is fantastic! The waiting room is bright and welcoming with Broadway Show albums playing. The office is efficient and I rarely wait more than a few minutes to be seen. The administrative staff is friendly and do a great job! I feel grateful.

text.text: Dr. Joey Fernandez is excellent! He is professional, knowledgeable, thorough, attentive, and caring. He responds to questions, concerns, and messages quickly and thoughtfully. originalText.text: I can't say enough positive things about Dr. Fernandez and this office! Shout out to Jerée for being so kind and skilled for the first part of my appointment! I always feel like I'm in excellent hands here. I really appreciate the way Dr. Fernandez clearly explains treatments, medicines, and insurance. There are no bad surprises and I always feel like they care about my comfort level and want to include me in what's happening. Even more, I've seen remarkable improvements in my health under Dr. Fernandez's care. I am so grateful for your exceptional service and support! I highly recommend Dr. Fernandez and the team at this beautiful office and l'm so grateful for the exceptional, quality care I've received!

originalText.text: Dr Fernandez was truly helpful and thorough & kind, as was his assistant. I’m so glad I made that appt. That whole health center is an oasis for nervous theatre artists! So Grateful.

originalText.text: Dr. Fernandez is professional, friendly, and actually listens! Been my primary for a couple years now and I highly recommend. Office is clean, staff great, and short wait time. Conveniently located near most major subway Iines.

originalText.text: Joey is fantastic and I am so grateful to have him as my primary care doctor!! Always sensitive and kind, direct and interested, I feel very taken care of!!
